languages.text: "Для бойца нет большей чести, чем погибнуть, исполняя долг. Никакого траура — только вечная слава".
languages.translation_comment: Completed Ulfar's second quest (to help him put the spirits of his brothers to rest on an icy world).

traits.locale_text: "Для бойца нет большей чести, чем погибнуть, исполняя долг. Ни траура, ни похорон — только вечная слава".

languages.text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."
languages.translation_comment: Completed Ulfar's second quest (to help him put the spirits of his brothers to rest on an icy world).
languages.original_text: "Для бойца нет большей чести, чем погибнуть, исполняя долг. Никакого траура — только вечная слава".

traits.locale_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."
"There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."
"There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."
"There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."
"There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."
"There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."

languages.text: 「戦士にとって、己の任務を全うして死ぬことほど大きな名誉はありません。嘆きはいらない―あるのは永遠の栄光だけです」
languages.original_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."

traits.locale_text: 「戦士にとって、己の任務を全うして死ぬことほど大きな名誉はありません。嘆きはいらない―あるのは永遠の栄光だけです」

languages.text: "Es gibt für einen Kämpfer keine größere Ehre, als bei der Ausübung ihrer Pflicht zu sterben. Keine Trauer, nur ewiger Ruhm."
languages.original_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt für einen Kämpfer keine größere Ehre, als bei der Ausübung ihrer Pflicht zu sterben. Keine Trauer, nur ewiger Ruhm."

languages.text: « Il n'existe pas de plus grand honneur pour un guerrier que de mourir en accomplissant son devoir. Pas de deuil, seule la gloire éternelle. »
languages.original_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'existe pas de plus grand honneur pour un guerrier que de mourir en accomplissant son devoir. Pas de deuil, seule la gloire éternelle. »

languages.text: «No existe mayor honor para un guerrero que morir cumpliendo con su deber. Sin luto alguno, únicamente la gloria eterna».
languages.original_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."

traits.locale_text: «No existe mayor honor para un guerrero que morir cumpliendo con su deber. Sin luto alguno, únicamente la gloria eterna».

languages.text: “对战士而言，最大的荣耀莫过于尽忠职守，壮烈牺牲。他们无需哀悼，他们只有永恒的荣耀。”
languages.original_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."

traits.locale_text: “对战士而言，最大的荣耀莫过于尽忠职守，壮烈牺牲。他们无需哀悼，他们只有永恒的荣耀。”

languages.text: "Bir savaşçının görevi uğruna can vermesinden daha büyük bir şeref yoktur. Ne yas ne de gözyaşı, yalnız ebedî ihtişam."
languages.original_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."

traits.locale_text: "Bir savaşçının görevi uğruna can vermesinden daha büyük bir şeref yoktur. Ne yas ne de gözyaşı, yalnız ebedî ihtişam."

languages.original_text: "There is no greater honour for a fighter than to die fulfilling their duty. No mourning — only eternal glory."
